item.title: Making Jekyll Blog Suitable for R-bloggers
item.description: According to the post add your blog, adding one’s blog to R-bloggers isn’t easy at all, especially for people who use R Markdown to write posts and use Jekyll to generate static web page on GitHub. HUGOMORE42 Two reasons make it difficult: The feed you submit should ONLY be about R (e.g: with R code, or directly related to the R world/community). This causes problem because most bloggers write posts spanning several topics, and some blogging platform doesn’t support RSS feed for a particular category of posts.
